name: book_a_flight
description: Book a flight from one location to another

origin.description: The city and state code (e.g. SFO) for the origin airport

destination.description: The city and state code (e.g. JFK) for the destination airport

departure_date.description: The date of departure, in YYYY-MM-DD format

name: order_food_delivery
description: Order food delivery from a local restaurant

items.description: The list of items you want to order

principal.description: The amount you borrow for your home loan

interest_rate.description: The annual interest rate on your home loan

term.description: The number of years in which you must repay your mortgage

title.description: The title of your to-do list

tasks.description: The list of tasks you need to complete

name: calculate_caloric_intake
description: Calculate your daily caloric intake based on your height, weight, and daily activity level

name: schedule_an_appointment
description: Schedule an appointment with a doctor

doctor.description: The name of the doctor you want to see

date.description: The date you want to schedule the appointment for

time.description: The time you want to schedule the appointment for

songs.description: The list of songs you want to include in your playlist

name: purchase_a_train_ticket
description: Purchase a train ticket for a given route

origin.description: The station code for the starting point of your journey

destination.description: The station code for the endpoint of your journey

date.description: The date of your journey, in YYYY-MM-DD format

name: find_a_tutor
description: Search for a tutor for a specific subject

subject.description: The subject you need a tutor for

location.description: The location where you would like the tutoring sessions to take place

name: submit_an_insurance_claim
description: Submit a claim to your insurance provider for reimbursement

provider.description: The name of your insurance provider

claim_amount.description: The amount you are requesting to be reimbursed for
